Text.Page:
Do you ever wonder what my role is around here? All I seem to do is send you to Elthienne and then pay you when she sends you back.

But, I've got one job, dammit, and I'm going to do it!

Go see {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}. There. Done.

About time Taratia sent you over here. That girl is such a slacker!

This is a high-pressure career. If it's not crafting, it's collecting parts for crafting.

By the way, today, it's crafting. Deliver your completed work to {@LinkCreature:63#3001#Barian}.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft three {@RawItem:206812} and bring your finished work to me.
Thank you in advance.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft three {@RawItem:206813} and bring your finished work to me.
Thank you in advance.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft three {@RawItem:206814} and bring your finished work to me.
Thank you in advance.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft three {@RawItem:206815} and bring your finished work to me.
Thank you in advance.

Wonderful!

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} will pay you.

Help out again next time!

Craft three {@RawItem:206816} and bring your finished work to me.
Thank you in advance.

{@LinkCreature:63#3001#Barian} tells me that he's pleased with your work. In fact, everyone in the Hands of Velika appreciates your service.

Funny, no one ever tells me how good I am at sending you to see people.

Ah, well. See you around.
